UNIX/LINUX, ENVIRONMENT

Linux Environment

Jul 13, 2023 George Belic Jul 13, 2023 George Belic /apa-itu-shell/shell_evolution.png

A list of some utilities, fonts and themes to beautify your linux setup.

A list of some utilities, fonts and themes to beautify your linux setup.

Desktop Environment
  • Gnome 4.0 Desktop Environment
  • Extensions: Tweak, Tiling, Extension List
  • Icons: CandyIcons
  • Theme: Sweet Theme v4.0: YT Tutorial by Link Vegas
  • Sounds: Enchanted
  • Desktop Wallpapers
Fonts
  • Nerd Fonts - JetBrains Mono (Patched). Check it out.
Terminal
  • Alacritty
  • Theme: Dracula
Shell
  • Fish Shell
  • Theme: Dracula
  • Fisher Plugin Manager
  • Starship Prompt
Tiling Manager
  • Tmux
  • TPM Plugin Manager
  • TMUX Theme: Dracula
  • Tmuxinator
Search
  • fzf: Command Line Fuzzy Finder
Viewers
  • PDF: Zathura, Evince
  • Markdown: mdless, Glow
  • Text files: Bat
Editor
  • NeoVim
  • Plugins: NvChad
  • Theme: TokyoDark
Screen Recording
  • Gifcap
